bibl.title: Papyrus Fragments from the Monastery of Phoebammon.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: MacCoull, Leslie S.B.

bibl.note: Three fragments belonging to the Blemyomachia. They are from the same codex (4th/5th cent.) as the Berlin papyrus of this poem, P. Berol. Inv. 5003 (= Pack2 1852).
bibl.seg: MacCoull Leslie S.B., Papyrus Fragments from the Monastery of Phoebammon.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 491-498, 1 fig.
